CustomField.formula: If ( AND( (CarRecord__r.LatestTouchpoint__c = Id), CarRecord__r.RepClosed__c ), "Complete" ,IF ( AND( (CarRecord__r.LatestTouchpoint__c = Id), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Open") ), "Open" ,IF ( AND( (CarRecord__r.LatestTouchpoint__c = Id), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Open")), NOT(CarRecord__r.RepClosed__c)), "Not Complete" ,IF ( AND( (CarRecord__r.LatestTouchpoint__c != Id), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Skipped")), "Skipped" , IF ( AND (CarRecord__r.LatestTouchpoint__c != Id, ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Closed")), "Complete", "")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the status of this Touchpoint?
CustomField.label: Step Completed By Rep
